source.sqlReaderQuery:
UPDATE UsageAggregates
  SET
	 ResourceUri = JSON_VALUE(InstanceData, '$."Microsoft.Resources".resourceUri')
	,[Location] = JSON_VALUE(InstanceData, '$."Microsoft.Resources".location') 
  WHERE 
		ISJSON(InstanceData) > 0
	AND ResourceUri IS NULL

SELECT 1 AS COMPLETED

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('DELETE FROM UsageAggregates WHERE SubscriptionId = ''', pipeline().parameters.subscriptionId, ''' SELECT 1 AS COMPLETED')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT 
	 rg.SubscriptionId
	,r.Location
FROM
	Resources r
		INNER JOIN
	ResourceGroups rg
		ON r.ResourceGroupId = rg.Id

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('DELETE FROM BillingSubscriptions WHERE AccountId = ''', item()['Id'], '''  SELECT 1 AS COMPLETED')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
UPDATE Costs
SET CreatedOn = CONVERT(datetime, CONVERT(CHAR(8), UsageDate))

SELECT 1 AS COMPLETE
